name: df-concat
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cconcat, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), cif(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cfv(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))))
comment: Define the concatenation operator which combines two words. Definition in Section 9.1 of [AhoHopUll] p. 318. (Contributed by FL, 14-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)
